mapper.update:
update t_ent_rented_record
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
plate_no = #{plateNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
down_time = #{downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
leave_time = #{leaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stall_id = #{stallId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
stall_name = #{stallName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_id = #{preId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pre_name = #{preName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_ent_rented_record set plate_no = #{plateNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, down_time = #{downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, leave_time = #{leaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stall_id = #{stallId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stall_name = #{stallName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_id = #{preId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pre_name = #{preName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update.foreach: update t_ent_rented_record set plate_no = #{item.plateNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, down_time = #{item.downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, leave_time = #{item.leaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stall_id = #{item.stallId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{item.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{item.status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stall_name = #{item.stallName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_id = #{item.preId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pre_name = #{item.preName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{item.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{item.type,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.update: update t_ent_rented_record set status = 3 where stall_id = #{stallId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and status = 0
update t_ent_rented_record set type = #{type} where id = #{id}
